name: Elearning Blog
short_description: Designing Digitally, Inc. focuses on establishing educational, engaging, and entertaining learning experiences that incorporate gamification to boost learner retention. The award-winning company provides a broad range of E-Learning solutions, ranging from scoring and achievement systems to fully immersive serious games. All developments are tailored specifically to their clients’ individual requirements. Once they’ve established their clients’ specific learning objectives, Designing Digitally, Inc. selects the appropriate gaming elements and platforms which will best accomplish those objectives. Clients also have regular opportunities to offer input during the entire development process, ensuring their active involvement in the final product they receive.
